resources.string: This is an example application from github.com/ollide/rosjava_android_template!\n\nIf you\'re connected to a running ROS master, the SimplePublisherNode publishes the current time every second to the /time topic. Execute \'rostopic echo /time\' to validate that everything\'s working as expected.

Connect both the ubuntu and the android phone to the same local network. The android local IP address is given above. The ubuntu local IP can be found by ifconfig. Then in a ubuntu terminal, run
 export ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.IP.Android:11311
 export ROS_IP=192.168.IP.Ubuntu
 export ROS_HOSTNAME=192.168.IP.Ubuntu
 rostopic echo /imu_data
 Note replace the addresses accordingly.
